title: Define Catppuccin Mocha color palette and base styles
description:
Add color constants and base lipgloss styles to model.go. Include:

Colors (Catppuccin Mocha hex values):
- Pink (#F5C2E7) - headers, primary
- Blue (#89DCEB) - selected items
- Lavender (#A6ADC8) - dim/unselected
- Gray (#6C7086) - borders, muted
- Purple (#CBA6F7) - epic type
- Red (#F38BA8) - P1 priority, errors, blocked
- Peach (#FAB387) - P2 priority, warnings
- Green (#A6E3A1) - P3 priority, success, closed
- Teal (#94E2D5) - features
- Surface (#313244) - backgrounds

Base styles:
- headerStyle (bold, pink)
- panelStyle (rounded border, gray border)
- selectedStyle (blue, bold)
- dimStyle (lavender)
- footerStyle (gray)
- labelStyle (gray, fixed width)

Match ticks styling exactly for suite consistency.
